name: prompt-evaluator
description: OCI LLM Comparison Demo - Unified development setup

scripts.setup: npm install && npx concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd backend && uv sync" "cd frontend && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "cd backend && uv run uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
